_______________________ Announcement of Procurement __________________________________ '__**
# title: 7 & 9 Reesor Event Venue Commercial Lease

## Location 
The solicitation is for a commercial lease of a one-of-a-kind event venue in Rouge National Urban Park (RNUP), located in Toronto.

## Reference Information
* **Solicitation Number**: PCA-2023-COMM001-RNUP 
* **Amendment Number**: 8 
* **Reference Number**: cb-975-55964216

## Brief Description
Parks Canada is seeking proposals for a lessee and commercial operator of event space at the RNUP. The selected operator will be responsible for the maintenance, repair, and management of the identified event venues and structures.

## Offer Selection Criteria
A variety of methods may be used to select the successful offeror, including but not limited to:

* Land parcels
* Permanent buildings and structures

## Important Documents and Attachments
* Amendment closing date [PDF](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/21546/amend-close-date_-en_rfp-7-9-reesor-event-venue_final_v2.pdf "2024-04-18T17:00:00 ")

## Contact 
For more information, please contact:
  
•  **Name**: Deandra Patterson
•  **Email**:  deandra.patterson@pc.gc.ca
•  **Phone**: (416) 918-7308


## Related Procurement Documents
* The Tender Notice and related documentation can be accessed on the Canada Buys website.



Appear As
* Catalogue Item No.: 15-60406
	+ 1. 43315000 or 95100000 or 95120000 or 96510000
## Other Related Information
Parks Canada encourages Canadian businesses to submit their proposals and take advantage of the many benefits offered by Canada's trade agreements. For information on Canada's trade agreements, please visit [GOVERNMENT TRADE AGREEMENT TRACKER](http://buyandsell.gc.ca/initiatives/trade-landscape).
